languages.text:
"- Оно живое, ж-живое!
- Что? Ты чего орешь?
- О-оно! Эта тварь только что присосалась к лицу Луффы, и та свихнулась!
- Проклятье Трона...
- Руби ее, руби!
***
- Э-эй, ребята, в-вы это чего?
- Мы недосчитались друкарских сундуков, парень.
- Н-но я вообще слежу за...
*Звуки очереди, пущенной из пары болтеров*
***
- Беги, беги, беги, беги!
- В чем де... Ох, Трон бы меня побрал!
- А-а-а-а-а!"

languages.text:
"- It's alive, a-a-alive!
- What? Why are you screaming?
- That th-thing! It's just latched onto Luffa's face, and she went mad!
- Throne be damned...
- Cut it off, cut it!
***
- H-hey, guys, w-what's wrong?
- We're missing the Drukhari crates, lad.
- B-but I was told to look after the...
*The sounds of several bursts of bolter fire*
***
- Run, run, run, run!
- What the... Oh, Throne take me!
- A-a-a-argh!"

languages.text:
「- あれ、生きてる…い、い、生きてるぞ！
-は？何をぎゃあぎゃあ騒いでんだ？
- あああ、あれだ！ルファの顔に貼り付いたと思ったら、ルファの奴、正気を失っちまった！
- 嘘だろ…
- き、切り落とせ、切り落とすんだ！
***
- お、おい…一体どうした？
- デュカーリの箱が足りねえ。
- で、でも俺はあれを見張っておけって言われて…
*ボルターが何発か発砲される音*
***
- 逃げろ、逃げろ、逃げろ！
- なんだ…？ああ、なんてこった！
- うわあああ！」
languages.original_text:
"- It's alive, a-a-alive!
- What? Why are you screaming?

- Throne be damned...

***
- H-hey, guys, w-what's wrong?

- B-but I was told to look after the...
*The sounds of several bursts of bolter fire*
***

- A-a-a-argh!"

- うわあああ！」

languages.text:
«- ¡Está vivo! ¡Viiivo!
- ¿Qué? ¿A qué vienen esos gritos?
- ¡E... es esa cosa! Se ha agarrado a la cara de Luffa, ¡se ha vuelto loca!
- Maldición...
- ¡Córtasela, córtasela!
***
- Eh-eh, gente... ¿Qu-qué está pasando?
- Nos faltan las cajas Drukhari, chaval.
- Pe...pero a mí me han dicho que cuidara las...
*Varias ráfagas de bólter*
***
- ¡Corre, corre, corre, corre!
- ¿Qué es...? ¡Que el Trono me lleve!
- ¡A-a-a-argh!».
languages.original_text:
"- It's alive, a-a-alive!
- What? Why are you screaming?
- That th-thing! It's just latched onto Luffa's face, and she went mad!
- Throne be damned...

***

*The sounds of several bursts of bolter fire*
***
- Run, run, run, run!
- What the... Oh, Throne take me!
- A-a-a-argh!"

***

- ¡A-a-a-argh!».

languages.text:
“- 它是活的！它、它——它活了！
- 什么？吵嚷什么呢？
- 那个——那个东西！它刚刚贴在露法的脸上，她就发疯了！
- 天杀的黄金王座……
- 把它割掉！把它割掉！
***
- 嘿，伙计们，怎、怎么了？
- 有几个黑暗灵族的箱子不见了，小子。
- 可、可我是被叫去看守……
*几声爆矢枪开火的轰鸣*
***
- 跑、跑啊！快跑啊！快跑！
- 怎么回……天啊，黄金王座保佑我！
- 啊、啊、啊——！！”
languages.original_text:
"- It's alive, a-a-alive!
- What? Why are you screaming?
- That th-thing! It's just latched onto Luffa's face, and she went mad!
- Throne be damned...

***
- H-hey, guys, w-what's wrong?
- We're missing the Drukhari crates, lad.
- B-but I was told to look after the...
*The sounds of several bursts of bolter fire*
***
- Run, run, run, run!
- What the... Oh, Throne take me!
- A-a-a-argh!"

languages.text:
« C'est... C'est vivant !
– Hein ? Pourquoi tu cries comme ça ?
– C-Ce truc, là ! Il s'est accroché au visage de Luffa et elle est devenue folle !
– Par le Trône...
– Enlève-le, enlève-le !
***
– Hé, euh.. qu'est-ce qui se passe ?
– Les caisses drukharis ont disparu.
– M-Mais on m'a demandé de surveiller...
*On entend des tirs répétés de bolter*
***
– Courez, courez, courez !
– Qu'est-ce que... Oh, Empereur-Dieu tout-puissant !
– A-Argh ! »
languages.original_text:
"- It's alive, a-a-alive!
- What? Why are you screaming?
- That th-thing! It's just latched onto Luffa's face, and she went mad!
- Throne be damned...
- Cut it off, cut it!
***
- H-hey, guys, w-what's wrong?
- We're missing the Drukhari crates, lad.
- B-but I was told to look after the...
*The sounds of several bursts of bolter fire*
***
- Run, run, run, run!
- What the... Oh, Throne take me!
- A-a-a-argh!"

– A-Argh ! »

languages.text:
"- Es lebt, es l-l-lebt!
- Was? Warum schreit Ihr denn?
- Das D-Ding! Es hat sich einfach an Luffas Gesicht geheftet, und sie ist wahnsinnig geworden!
- Der Thron sei verdammt ...
- Hört auf, hört auf damit!
***
- H-Hey, Leute, w-was ist denn?
- Uns fehlen die Drukhari-Kisten, Bursche.
- A-Aber mir hat man gesagt, pass auf die ...
*Mehrere Bolter-Schüsse ertönen*
***
- Weg hier, weg hier, weg hier!
- Was zur ... Oh, der Thron hole mich!
- A-A-A-Argh!"

"- It's alive, a-a-alive!

languages.text:
"- Hayatta bu, ha... Hayatta!
- Ne? Ne bağırıyorsun?
- Şu şe... Şey! Luffa'nın yüzüne yapıştığı gibi delirtti!
- Taht'ın işine bak...
- Kesin şunu, kesin!
***
- Se... Selam arkadaşlar, so... Sorun ne?
- Drukhari sandıkları ortada yok be oğlum.
- A... Ama bana demişlerdi ki...
*Seri şekilde ateşlenen bulonatar sesi*
***
- Kaç, kaç, kaç, kaç!
- Hay anasını... Taht alsın canımı!
- Aaaaa!"
languages.original_text:
"- It's alive, a-a-alive!
- What? Why are you screaming?
